mygame.state

Class SagutGuiState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.app.state.BaseAppState
      • mygame.state.SagutAppState
        • mygame.state.SagutGuiState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.app.state.AppState, de.lessvoid.nifty.screen.ScreenController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HUDGuiState, MainMenuGuiState

    public abstract class SagutGuiState
extends SagutAppState
implements de.lessvoid.nifty.screen.ScreenController
    This class represents the GUI as an AppState. Made because the GUI State requires Nifty, NiftyDisplay, and ScreenController.
